title: Any item cannot be selected at the first attempt in the library outline view
description:
Description: When attempting to select an item for the first time in the library outline view, the item does not get selected. Instead, the focus jumps to the library file node in the outline view.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Attempt to select an item in the outline view.
OB: When I try to select any item for the first time in the library outline view, the focus automatically shifts to the library file node in the outline view.
EB: Upon selecting an item for the second time, it gets selected correctly.
SR:
1. Open the library outline view.
2. Try to select an item in the outline view. Note that the first attempt does not result in the item being selected.
